overview: Desire Hostility Delusion Synopsis Desire, Hostility, Delusion is a story about 4 women. Two career driven women, a lawyer and a cinematographer, find themselves in a 10 year relationship that started with the understanding that children where not part of their dream. Comfort and security was their objective, and in life itâ€™s only a matter of time before women no matter their sexual preference, has an urge, a maternal desire to have a child, or so one would think.
title: Desire, Hostility, Delusion
